content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your electrical service appointment?
Thanks, Linda! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we can service your location?
Let me check if we service 123 Elm Street, Springfield for electrical work.
I'm having trouble verifying if we service your address due to a system issue. I will get help from one of our human operators to assist you shortly.
reason: System error when calculating service area

content: Hello Linda, this is Joe from XYZ. Sorry for the wait. I have manually verified that we do service your address at 123 Elm Street, Springfield. When would you like to schedule your electrical service?
Thanks, Joe. I'm available next Tuesday afternoon if that works.
Tuesday afternoon works. I will book your appointment for electrical service on that day. Please hold on a moment.
Your appointment is set for next Tuesday afternoon. We look forward to servicing your electrical needs. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day, Linda!
